data.name: Berry Magician Girl
data.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Magician Girl" monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn, during either player's turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect that targets this card, or targets this card for an attack: You can change this card's battle position, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Magician Girl" monster from your Deck, except "Berry Magician Girl".

card_sets.set_name: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions Movie Pack
Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions Movie Pack Secret Edition
